onfailure

onfailure compiles various artists of the experimental electronic music genre into a special edition issue. Contains a CD, a descriptive booklet and a series of 12 computer generated music visualizations. Each of them is created by a script that processes the CD’s songs and produces prints based on their individual characteristics.

In collaboration with:

Lisbon — 2019
